title: Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Rally 5.18%
text:
Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Rally 5.18% Sep 20, 2015 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) rose by 5.18% in the past week and 3.71% for the last 4 weeks. In the past week, the shares have outperformed the S&P 500 by 4.13% and the outperformance increases to 8.2% for the last 4 weeks. 
S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 8.27% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 6.98%. The company shares have rallied 26.53%   $30.26 and the 200 day moving average is recorded at $29.17. S&P 500 has rallied 1.82% during the last 52-weeks. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) : On Friday heightened volatility was witnessed in S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) which led to swings in the share price. The shares opened for trading at $30.73 and hit $31.37 on the upside , eventually ending the session at $31.29, with a gain of 0.64% or 0.2 points. The heightened volatility saw the trading volume jump to 1,104,913 shares. The 52-week high of the share price is $32.88 and the company has a market cap of $1,089 million. The 52-week low of the share price is at $23.07 . 
  
  Securities and Exchange Commission has divulged that Gibson James Thomas, director of S&T Bancorp Inc, had unloaded 25,000 shares at an average price of $31.3 in a transaction dated on July 24, 2015. The total value of the transaction was worth $782,500. Currently  9.12%
